tossupQ:
MATH Short Answer The painting “Starry Night” by Vincent van Gogh is approximately 70 
centimeters tall and 100 centimeters wide. If you buy a reproduction that is 20 centimeters wide, 
how many centimeters tall would it be?
bonusQ:
MATH Short Answer What real numbers cannot be part of the domain of the following 
function: f(x) = x/(x<sup>2</sup>  + 3x - 10)(read as: f of x equals x over open parenthesis x squared plus 3x 
minus 10 close parenthesis).

tossupQ:
GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following elements exists in nature? 
 
W) Berkelium 
X) Protactinium (read as: prōe-tahk-TI-nee-uhm) 
Y) Mendelevium (read as: mehn-deh-LEE-vee-uhm) 
Z) Curium
bonusQ:
GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is NOT true regarding one 
mole of two different stable isotopes of the same atom? 
 
W) Both have the same number of molecules 
X) Both have the same mass 
Y) If used in the same chemical reaction, both produce the same number of moles of products 
Z) Both have the same number of protons
bonusA: X) BOTH HAVE THE SAME MASS

X) Summer temperatures are higher

from the fish. As a result, the fish dies but the sea lamprey lives. Of what type of relationship is 
this an example?
bonusQ:

males that reproduce, while other members of the colony do not reproduce. These animals have 
social castes and overlapping generations that all live in the same colony. What term best 
describes this type of life history?

bonusA:
2K
(s)
 + 2H
2
O
(l)
 → 2KOH
(aq)
 + H
2(g) 
 (NOTE: S = SOLID; L = LIQUID; AQ = AQUEOUS; G = GAS)

ENERGY Multiple Choice Typical households using natural gas consumed 22% less 
natural gas in 2009 than in 1990. Which of the following is NOT a reason for the decline? 
 
W) Increased efficiency of appliances 
X) Population shift towards warmer regions 
Y) Decreased use of natural gas for home heating 
Z) Reduction in the number of consumers
tossupA: Z) REDUCTION IN THE NUMBER OF CONSUMERS
